tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_attendance (
    id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time_in TIME,
    time_out TIME,
    biometric_identifier VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hired_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time_in TIME,
    time_out TIME
);
